headline: OnPolitics: Should Russia be kicked out of the G-20?
author: Amy Nakamura
sentences: More on reserve medical staff: When not on call to help with public health emergencies, reserve medical workers work in federal agencies like the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, as health care workers in their communities or in public and private hospitals as emergency room doctors, paramedics and safety officers.

President Biden wants to boot Russia from G-20
President Joe Biden said Russia should be kicked out of the Group of 20 nations in retaliation for its invasion of Ukraine, a major step that would further isolate the Kremlin and restrict Russia's say in the global economy.
